title: Public Libraries in Taiwan
intro: Explore the most beautiful and quietest reading spaces across Taiwan.

spots.name: Taipei Public Library Beitou Branch
spots.description: Taiwan's first green library, famous for its wooden architecture nestled in the park.

spots.name: Kaohsiung Main Public Library
spots.description: A stunning green building with a hanging garden offering views of the harbor.
